ygData.subject: Re: Accelerando update
ygData.msgSnippet: From: Firehawk  ... I always figured this was just due to the song getting faster as you level.  Running all the way across West Karana
ygData.messageBody:
From: "Firehawk" <firehawk@...>
>
> Has anyone noticed that stamina is now draining from us while running with
> Accelerando? I was just running through SK and found my stamina bar rapidly
> decreasing.. I have never seen that except when running and jumping, or

I always figured this was just due to the song getting faster
as you level. Running all the way across West Karana has
always taken about a bubble of stamina, and still does (as of
about 2 weeks ago). It just takes less time for me to cross
the distance now, so you lose stamina faster over time, but
it's the same stamina drain for the distance covered.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
